info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 17 at 1:19PM MDT until April 17 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Western Otero County in south central New Mexico... East central Luna County in southwestern New Mexico... Southern Dona Ana County in south central New Mexico... Northwestern El Paso County in western Texas...
* Until 415 PM MDT.
* At 117 PM MDT, plumes of blowing dust were developing across southern Dona Ana County and northern Chihuahua. Visibility will continue to worsen over the next hour. Warnings may need to be extended into Las Cruces and El Paso later this afternoon.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility.
SOURCE...Satellite imagery.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 147 and 164. Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 1 and 8. New Mexico Highway 9 west of Santa Teresa.
Locations impacted include... Vinton, Mount Riley, Afton Generating Plant, Chaparral, San Miguel, Canutillo, Kilbourne Hole, High Valley, Westway, Santa Teresa, Anthony, Camel Mountain, Mesquite, Afton, Union Pacific Intermodal Terminal, Aden Crater, Anthony Gap, Chamberino, La Union, and La Mesa.
info.instruction: Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 4:15 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 4:15 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

area.areaDesc: Dona Ana, NM; Luna, NM; Otero, NM; El Paso, TX

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 4:15 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 4:15 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.

area.areaDesc: Dona Ana, NM; Luna, NM; Otero, NM; El Paso, TX
